EditConstraint

                      Constraint oureditConstraint,
                      Constraint ontParent,
                      boolean newItem)
The constructor for the constraint editor

Parameters:
display - - our display
oureditConstraint - - the constraint being created
ontParent - - the parent of the constraint in the hierarchy
newItem - - set to true if we are creating a new constraint
